text_block_list.name: Upbeat Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Oh, she's back!

text_block_list.name: Caring Umamusume
text_block_list.text: McQueen, great work out there!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: You've all come back to meet me?<n>I'm touched.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Second place—you were so close!<n>'Twas a great race!
choice_data_list:
Everyone out there today was in absolute top
form.

Everyone out there today was in absolute top
form.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Yes, there is no doubt about that. I<n>could tell that everyone
had prepared<n>well, and their focus was laser-sharp.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: This time, I was simply beaten fair<n>and square.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: You seem quite pleased, considering.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
This race was nothing if not fruitful. I<n>have a clear idea of
what I need to<n>improve on for next time.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Every race is a learning experience.<n>Also...

text_block_list.name: Sincere Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Also?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Unlike at the Japan Cup, I simply felt<n>satisfied with myself
and my running.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: I was able to convert all of your<n>expectations into power.

text_block_list.name: Upbeat Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Give it your all at the next one too,<n>McQueen!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Yes, of course.

text_block_list.name: Caring Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Lookin' forward to it, ace!

text_block_list.name: Sincere Umamusume
text_block_list.text: I already know that it's going to be a<n>fabulous race!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: I intend to show you exactly what an<n>ace is capable of.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
All right, I think we're done here. I<n>heard Trainer's got a
huge feast lined<n>up for us!

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
Sure do! I even put aside some of my<n>last paycheck just for
this!

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
Sure do! I even put aside some of my<n>last paycheck just for
this!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: ...Oh, did you now?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: As you know, I was watching howmuch I ate in preparation for this race.I am quite famished.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Have you ever dined together with so<n>many hungry
Umamusume at once?

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Um...

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Oh hey, we should totally invite Oguri<n>and Ryan too!

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: W-wait a minute! My wallet's<n>definitely not that full!

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: W-wait a minute! My wallet's<n>definitely not that full!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Sorry, no takebacks!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Hehe, let's go, Trainer!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
A year after Oguri Cap's miraculous<n>Arima Kinen
performance... Team<n>Sirius begins yet another new<n>
chapter.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Though they may have stumbled a bit<n>along the way, the
team's rookie ace<n>and rookie trainer never stopped<n>
running forward.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
There is still much room to grow<n>before Sirius reaches the
same<n>heights as time past...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
However, the passion inherited from<n>the previous
generation is firmly<n>woven into the fabric of the team.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: It's time, everyone.

text_block_list.name: Upbeat Umamusume
text_block_list.text: You can do it, ace! ♪

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
I heard that if you can pull off this<n>double-W, there's a pile
of sweets<n>waitin' for ya!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Oh! Is that true?!

text_block_list.name: Sincere Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
You shouldn't have said that. How<n>will she concentrate
now?!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: I mean, I thought that would get her<n>fired up. Did it backfire?

text_block_list.name: Caring Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Hey, ace! Get your mind back on the<n>course!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Y-yes, you're absolutely right! The<n>course... Focus on the...
dessert<n>course...

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: McQueen, your rival today is the<n>undefeated Tokai Teio.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: McQueen, your rival today is the<n>undefeated Tokai Teio.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
Judging by the way she's raced so<n>far, she's a force to be
reckoned with.<n>And to back that up, she's also<n>today's
favorite to win.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: But I know that in the end, you'll<n>cross that finish line first!

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: But I know that in the end, you'll<n>cross that finish line first!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Hehe... Yes, I should think so. With all<n>of your support as my
tailwind, I feel<n>ready to soar any distance!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Yes. I'm going to win.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Wooooo!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Mejiro McQueen! Mejiro McQueen!<n>She extends her lead
to three lengths!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Mejiro McQueen crosses the finish!<n>She is the first
Umamusume in history<n>to ever achieve two consecutive<n>
victories at the spring Tenno Sho!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Wooooo!

text_block_list.name: Upbeat Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Congratulations, McQueen!

text_block_list.name: Caring Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Sob... I can't believe it!

text_block_list.name: Sincere Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Our ace is just the best...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Thank you all so much!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: I will continue to run—to carry your<n>dreams onward!
